data.message: It was in Dundee last year why not this year

replies.message: Hi Jennii, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations. Thanks
So only one Scottish location, one a school day, centre of Scotland might have bn better or why not do as usual more locations
Only two dates for whole of Scotland! Both in Glasgow! Insulting and not on! You say you search for new and different locations each year, but you can only find ONE place in Scotland?! 😡
